in 2022, skip lines 8 through 15; multiply line 7 by 85% (0.85) and

Is the amount on line 8 less than the amount on line 7? No. None of your social security benefits are taxable. Enter -0- on Form 1040 or
STOP
1040-SR, line 6b. If you are married filing separately and you lived apart from

spouse, or married filing separately and you lived apart from your spouse for all of 2022 . . . . . . 10.
Subtract line 10 from line 9. If zero or less, enter -0- . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 11. Enter the smaller of line 9 or line 10 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 12.
Enter one-half of line 12 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 13. Enter the smaller of line 2 or line 13 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 14.
